tasks.title: Set up your laptop
tasks.description: Unbox your MacBook, sign into your Airbnb account, and install core applications (Slack, Zoom, 1Password).

tasks.title: Set up development environment
tasks.description: Install development tools, configure SSH keys, clone repositories, and verify your local environment works.

subtasks.title: Install Homebrew and CLI tools (Git, Node, Python)
Clone main repository and install dependencies

tasks.title: Set up VPN and security tools
tasks.description: Install VPN client, configure 2FA, and set up required security software.

tasks.title: Meet with your manager
tasks.description: Initial 1:1 to discuss role expectations, team priorities, and set up recurring meetings.

tasks.title: Coffee chat with onboarding buddy
tasks.description: Get to know your onboarding buddy. Ask questions about the team, codebase, and culture.

tasks.title: Complete security training
tasks.description: Required security fundamentals course covering data handling, access control, and security best practices.

tasks.title: Review code standards
tasks.description: Learn Airbnb's coding standards, style guides, and code review process.

tasks.title: Attend team meetings
tasks.description: Join sprint planning, standup, and team sync meetings to understand team cadence.

tasks.title: Meet with Staff Engineer
tasks.description: Technical discussion with your team's Staff Engineer about architecture and system design.

tasks.title: Complete Trust & Safety training
tasks.description: Learn about content moderation systems, ML models, and handling sensitive data.

tasks.title: Ship your first commit
tasks.description: Make a small code contribution to get familiar with the development workflow and code review process.

tasks.title: Meet with PM partner
tasks.description: Introduction meeting with your Product Manager partner to understand product priorities.

tasks.title: Review system architecture docs
tasks.description: Read through Trust & Safety architecture documentation and service diagrams.

tasks.title: Ship your first feature
tasks.description: Take ownership of a starter task and ship it to production.

tasks.title: Set up your laptop
tasks.description: Unbox your MacBook, sign into your Airbnb account, and install core applications (Slack, Zoom, 1Password, Figma).

tasks.title: Meet with your manager
tasks.description: Initial 1:1 to discuss product area, expectations, stakeholders, and set up recurring meetings.

tasks.title: Review product area documentation
tasks.description: Read through Experiences product strategy, roadmap, recent launches, and competitive landscape.

tasks.title: Coffee chat with onboarding buddy
tasks.description: Get to know your onboarding buddy. Ask about PM practices, team dynamics, and tips for success.

tasks.title: Complete PM fundamentals training
tasks.description: Learn Airbnb's product development process, frameworks, and best practices.

tasks.title: Complete Airbnb values training
tasks.description: Deep dive into Airbnb's mission, values, and how they inform product decisions.

tasks.title: Create stakeholder map
tasks.description: Identify key stakeholders across Engineering, Design, Data, Marketing, and leadership. Document communication preferences and meeting cadences.

subtasks.title: Map engineering partners and tech leads
Schedule recurring syncs with key stakeholders

tasks.title: Attend product team meetings
tasks.description: Join product reviews, sprint planning, and strategy sessions to understand team rhythm.

tasks.title: Complete user research training
tasks.description: Learn Airbnb's approach to user research and how to leverage our research team.

tasks.title: Meet with design partner
tasks.description: Introduction meeting with your design partner to establish collaboration workflow.

tasks.title: Meet with engineering lead
tasks.description: Technical discussion with engineering lead about technical constraints and opportunities.

tasks.title: Review customer research
tasks.description: Read recent user research reports, customer feedback, and support tickets for Experiences.

tasks.title: Review product metrics
tasks.description: Get familiar with key metrics, dashboards, and how to access product data.

tasks.title: Write your first PRD
tasks.description: Take ownership of a feature and write a product requirements document.

tasks.title: Set up your laptop
tasks.description: Unbox your MacBook, sign into your Airbnb account, and install core applications (Slack, Zoom, 1Password).

tasks.title: Meet with your manager
tasks.description: Initial 1:1 to discuss role responsibilities, team goals, and set up recurring meetings.

tasks.title: Coffee chat with onboarding buddy
tasks.description: Get to know your onboarding buddy. Ask about systems, processes, and team culture.

tasks.title: Review team documentation
tasks.description: Read through Employee Experience team charter, processes, and recent initiatives.

tasks.title: Complete Workday basics training
tasks.description: Introduction to Workday navigation, basic employee data management, and system overview.

tasks.title: Complete GDPR compliance training
tasks.description: Required training on data privacy, GDPR requirements, and employee data handling.

tasks.title: Complete Airbnb values training
tasks.description: Learn about Airbnb's mission, values, and how they apply to employee experience.

tasks.title: Attend team meetings
tasks.description: Join weekly team syncs, case review meetings, and stakeholder check-ins.

tasks.title: Complete advanced Workday training
tasks.description: Deep dive into benefits administration, PTO management, reporting, and advanced workflows.

tasks.title: Complete employee relations training
tasks.description: Learn about conflict resolution, performance management support, and handling sensitive issues.

tasks.title: Meet with recruiting operations
tasks.description: Introduction meeting to understand candidate-to-employee transition workflows.

tasks.title: Shadow your buddy for a day
tasks.description: Observe your buddy handling employee inquiries, system tasks, and day-to-day work.

tasks.title: Take on first employee cases
tasks.description: Start handling employee inquiries with buddy support (PTO questions, benefits enrollment, system access).

tasks.title: Deep dive on benefits programs
tasks.description: Learn details of all benefits offerings to better support employee questions.
